Windlord/Aerotaur/Trinity::

"Then... we can safely fly to the base" said the male "I'd be worried 
if the follow us... we can't face a strong menace..."

Quickly Windlord arrived to Chivtron's and landed... He opened his 
comm link and said "Windlord to Aerotaur, I come witha new friend 
that needs cr..."


"I'm going where you're, WIndlord" answered Aerotaur, who said to 
Nightlight and the others Chivtrons "I go out to help Windlord, a new 
bot needs cr"

Aerotaur left the room and went out

"Windlord came????? he's OK, HE'S OK!!!!!" Said Happily Trinity

********

Aerotaur left the base and went where Windlord and Grounded "Hello 
said Aerotaur to Grounded "I'm Aeortaur, who're you?"
